    • crmCall

      public Object crmCall(String path, String method, Map<String,Object> params) throws Exception
      Perform a JSON-RPC call against the configured apiUrl + path.
      Parameters:
      path - endpoint path (for example "/jsonrpc")
      method - JSON-RPC method name (usually "call")
      params - parameters map to send as "params"
      Returns:
      the "result" object from the JSON-RPC response or the full response map if no result key
      Throws:
      Exception - on serialization/network errors

    • crmCallExecuteKw

      public Object crmCallExecuteKw(String model, String methodName, Object[] args, Map<String,Object> kwargs) throws Exception
      Convenience to call Odoo's execute_kw via JSON-RPC (service object -> execute_kw)
      Parameters:
      model - model name (e.g. "res.partner")
      methodName - method to invoke (e.g. "search_read")
      args - positional args for the method (e.g. domain)
      kwargs - keyword args for the method (e.g. {"fields": [...]})
      Returns:
      result from the JSON-RPC response
      Throws:
      Exception
